description: sitting on a bench, in the sun, initially thinking about technology and my experiences with waterfall design, relaxing, then writing about it on my notebook. i couldn't achieve the same freedom of thought with a screen in front of my eyes, or an open device, or in an office, or in a bar. devices annoy, limit, tire, bore
chat with two street artists and a retired guide, listen to their music and shoot videos for them
productive hours. connected the result of years of work through some texts that are totally disorganised and would require a lot of time in order to be processed
